dataList.name: เงินง่าย
dataList.desc:
Turn End: If this unit hit a target this turn, gain 1 [Enhancement] next turn
If the target is Hong Lu, gain 1 [ParryingResultUp] and 1 [AttackDmgUp] next turn as well

dataList.name: โอ้ะแย่แล้ว
dataList.desc:
Lose 5 SP on Clash Lose
When Staggered, gain 2 [Vulnerable] next turn (once per turn)

dataList.name: หุ่นฝึกซ้อม
dataList.desc:
Can be damaged only with damages equal to or higher than 10
All damage under 10 is nullified

dataList.name: หุ่นฝึกซ้อมอัพเกรดได้
dataList.desc:
Turn End: if this unit failed to hit with a Skill, gain [ParryingResultUp] next turn equal to the number of turns this unit failed to hit
If this unit hits an enemy with a Skill, reset the above stack

dataList.name: จดจำพื้นฐาน
dataList.desc:
Turn End: if this unit was hit by 4 or more Attack Skills, to all enemies that attacked this unit, apply 1 [AttackDmgUp] next turn for every turn this unit was hit
If this unit was hit by 3 or fewer Attack Skills, reset the above stack

dataList.name: คำสาปเลยเป้า
dataList.desc: When this unit is Staggered, halve the [Burst] Potency and [Burst] Count on the target this unit hit last

dataList.name: คำสาปไหหลอกหลอน
dataList.desc:
Turn End: If this unit hit a target this turn, gain 1 [Enhancement] next turn
If this unit kills itself, apply 1 [Enhancement] to all allies

dataList.name: คำสาปไหหลอกหลอน
dataList.desc:
On Skill hit: if target has 1 remaining [Burst] Count, inflict +1 [Burst] Count (2 times per turn)
On Hit: if target has 1 remaining [Burst], inflict 2 [Burst] (2 times per turn)
If this unit kills itself, inflict 2 [Burst] and +1 [Burst] Count on all enemies

dataList.name: คำสาปไหหลอกหลอน
dataList.desc:
On Skill hit: if target has 4+ [Burst], inflict 1 [DefenseDown] next turn (3 times per turn)
If this unit kills itself, inflict 3 [DefenseDown] on all enemies

dataList.name: คำสาปเลยเป้า
dataList.desc: When this unit is Staggered, eliminate the [Burst] Potency and [Burst] Count on the target this unit hit last

dataList.name: วิญญาณไหต้องคำสาป
dataList.desc: On Hit, if the target has 5+ ([Burst] Potency + [Burst] Count), inflict 1 [DefenseDown] (5 times per turn)

dataList.name: คำสาปไหหลอกหลอน
dataList.desc:
Turn End: against all enemies, inflict [Poison] equal to the number of turns that passed since this unit joined the battle (max 5)
If this unit kills itself, apply (# of turns x 5) [Poison] and inflict +2 [Burst] Count on all enemies next turn (max 25)

dataList.name: ได้รับความเสียหาย
dataList.desc:
When hit during the combat phase: +10% damage for the turn
When hit during the combat phase: on Clash Win, +20% damage

dataList.name: เป้าหมาย - เจี่ยเป่าอี้
dataList.desc: Prioritizes Hong Lu

dataList.name: เน้นย้ำเป้าหมาย
dataList.desc:
At 70%+ HP: at Turn End, if this unit failed to hit Hong Lu with a Skill, gain 1 [Reduction] next turn
At less than 70% HP: at Turn End, if this unit failed to hit Hong Lu with a Skill, inflict +1 more [Laceration] and [Laceration] Count next turn

dataList.name: ภารกิจคืบหน้า
dataList.desc: Deal +0.5% damage for every 1% missing HP on self (max 50%)

dataList.name: มุ่งเข้าเป้าหมาย
dataList.desc:
At 70%+ HP: at Turn End, if this unit failed to hit Hong Lu with a Skill, gain 1 [Reduction] next turn
At less than 70% HP: at Turn End, if this unit failed to hit Hong Lu with a Skill, gain 1 [Enhancement] next turn
- inflict +1 more [Laceration] and [Laceration] Count next turn

dataList.name: ได้รับความเสียหาย
dataList.desc:
When hit during the combat phase: +20% damage for the turn
During the combat phase: On Clash Lose, take +15% damage from the Skill

dataList.name: ฝึกฝนเมามาย
dataList.desc: Deal +2% damage for every 1% missing HP on self (max 100%)

dataList.name: แหม่ แหม่... เอิ่ก แบบนี้ไม่ได้เลยนะ
dataList.desc:
At 50% HP, recover from Stagger and end this turn.
Fix this unit's Speed to 10 next turn

dataList.name: เป้าหมายตั้งมั่น
dataList.desc:
At 70%+ HP: at Turn End, if this unit failed to hit Hong Lu with a Skill, gain 3 [AttackDown] next turn
At less than 70% HP: at Turn End, if this unit failed to hit Hong Lu with a Skill, gain 6 [AttackUp] next turn
